spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatches vs plan: bathroom suite is not correctly located/formed (shower placed inside left bedroom; bathroom core only has a sink). Corridor/hall geometry and the living-room inset wall arrangement do not match the plan’s wall layout. Kitchen area does not match the plan’s bottom-right L-shaped counter + sink/stove run. Several interior doors shown in plan are missing or repositioned; overall room proportions skew toward a more uniform/rectangular footprint than the plan’s stepped outline.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are partially incorrect (bathroom elements not contained within the bathroom; kitchen not occupying the correct zone/edge). Missing functional room features (toilet, shower inside bathroom; full kitchen run). Hall segmentation/door openings do not faithfully embed into the correct walls. At least one hallucinated small room/closet-like space appears at the top center that is not clearly present in the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Beds and a desk roughly correspond to the plan, and living room seating exists, but key fixtures are wrong (shower in bedroom; missing toilet). Kitchen fixtures/counters do not match the plan (no clear sink wall run; only an island/cooktop). Furniture scales are generally plausible, but placement does not follow the plan closely in service areas.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric with consistent materials and generally good lighting. Camera isometric view is acceptable and geometry is mostly clean. Minor clarity issues due to missing/ambiguous doors and simplified fixtures; not strictly orthographic but visually coherent.

detected_errors.description: Bathroom suite misplaced: shower is rendered inside the left bedroom instead of within the bathroom area shown in the 2D plan.
Missing bathroom elements: toilet not present in the bathroom; bathroom is incomplete relative to the 2D plan.

Kitchen layout mismatch: 2D plan shows a bottom-right L-shaped counter run with sink/stove placement; 3D render shows a simplified island/counter and does not match the plan’s counter/sink positioning.
Hall/corridor and internal partition walls do not align with the 2D plan’s stepped outline and inset living-room wall geometry.
Door placement/orientation mismatches: multiple plan-indicated doors (room entries off the hall and/or exterior entry) are not clearly present or are repositioned in the 3D render.
Window placement mismatch: windows are not placed consistently with the 2D plan’s top-edge window locations (bathroom/office positions).
Proportion distortion: overall footprint and relative room sizes appear more rectangular/uniform in 3D, deviating from the plan’s room proportions and offsets.
Hallucinated space: an extra small top-center room/closet-like area appears that is not clearly defined as a separate room in the 2D plan.
